ai-atk-abh03a56:1_1: The question of the aggregates, grasping, and mentality-materiality, is a condition for the grasping aggregates. Their element is a condition for the constituents (of mind and body).
ai-atk-abh03a56:1_2: and to the end of what is reckoned by joy.
ai-atk-abh03a56:2_0: the physical nutriment is called the basis for such powers, etc., and the bodily forms of the body as fuel for the most particular period of the body, for the sake of nutriment, and for the sake of nutriment consisting of forms.
ai-atk-abh03a56:2_1: The bodily formation is the condition for the bodily-formation through the kamma-originated elements; the bodily-form is a condition for the nutriment originated elements.
ai-atk-abh03a56:2_2: As one whose livelihood faculty is included in forms among the various kinds of foulness, etc., association with the producing condition, and is not a condition for the wrong way.
ai-atk-abh03a56:2_3: Whatever fat is to eat, crush, etc., that is to say, the nets, the bodies of the body, and the neck, yet the relics, etc., are not appropriately to say.
ai-atk-abh03a56:2_4: For they don’t know that the body is unrepulsive, not causing food for the sake of the body,
ai-atk-abh03a56:2_5: He is engaged in the kinds of fondness for his body, but so as mentioned to be converted.
ai-atk-abh03a56:2_6: And it is preceding the states consisting in grasping as the enlightenment factor and the distending of the body, etc., as it is stated . So it is of the kind already described .
ai-atk-abh03a56:2_7: But there are two kinds of nutriment: the bodily particulars and the body are not evident.
ai-atk-abh03a56:3_0: the commentary on the colours, etc.
